title: 1882 Fantastic PSA 4 Cosack and Co.--These Cards May be Hot Now
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: 1882 Fantastic PSA 4 Cosack and Co.--These Cards May be Hot Now
posts.post_content: Often called the most beautiful of the pre-1900 (or any time) trade cards, I am selling this only because I just picked up another.  Great image, color and rare perfect centering.  Only 2 higher at PSA.  Prices are all over the map on this card but surging now (see latest PWCC), so I have settled on $189 firm, plus $3 shipping, p/p gift.   Thanks!   [url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=227191&stc=1&d=1460218710[/url]
Bump--added new details and face that PSA 5 also available.
bump for another price cut, these cards may be hot now
